page.title: 04 MEDIA
page.content: WE DECIDED TO TRY TO DISCOVER WHAT SORT OF NEWSPAPERS PEOPLE TAKE IN THE GRAVESEND AREA.TO DO THIS WE MADE A SURVEY OF THE LOCAL AREA.WE ASKED PEOPLE 6 QUESTIONS.THESE WERE:DO YOU BUY A NATIONAL NEWSPAPER?WHICH ONE IS IT?DO YOU BUY A LOCAL NEWSPAPER?WHICH ONE DO YOU BUY AND IS IT DAILY?WHICH FREE NEWSPAPERS DO YOU GET? WE FOUND THAT 91% OF PEOPLE BUY A NATIONAL PAPER,THAT 82% GET A LOCAL PAPER AND THAT 89% GET A FREE LOCAL PAPER.THE MOST POPULAR LOCAL WEEKLY PAPER IS THE GRAVESEND REPORTER.IT HAS IT'S OFFICES IN GRAVESEND AND WRITES ABOUT LOCAL NEWS,EVENTS AND PEOPLE.IT IS DISTRIBUTED IN GRAVESEND AND DARTFORD ON THURSDAYS.THE GRAVESEND LEADER,A WEEKLY FREE PAPER HAS THE LARGEST DISTRIBUTION IN OUR AREA.
